thread.title: Luigi Giannotte

author: Luigi Giannotte
title: Luigi Giannotte
text:
I made a flight booking to Egypt through Opodo and realised that the Return flight was amended by Egyptair, so I wanted to react.
Problem : I booked through Opodo Germany and its phone number did not seem to work....so I called Opodo UK.
A lady from a call Center supported me, and did confirm the cancellation of my revervation ( without mentionning in her confirmation mail if the first leg of my trip was still ok and confirmed ).
After a few days of concern, I contacted Opodo Germany by e-mail , which asked me to contact them by phone for this matter...
Finally the gentleman of the Call center confirmed that my instructions had been well understood,and sent me straight away an e-mail confirmation indicating all details.
Sounds messy ( and it was...) but it feels fine when you can enjoy the result. thank you
